Reviews.Title: Great picture for the price!
Reviews.Author: James Geszvain
Reviews.Content: Paid $449 for the TV on Cyber Monday and I am very happy. Colors are great and Blacks are very black. Shipping company was slightly frustrating (Seko Logistics), I had to drive 70 miles to Indianapolis because they could only deliver during the times when I was working. I didn't include shipping in the rating because it doesn't have anything to do with TV performance. Loses one star for poor speaker quality (buzzes on high pitched sounds) and lack of optical output. Overall worth the price. Will update after 6 months.

Reviews.Title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
Reviews.Author: Audra Kight-Barrera
Reviews.Content: We got a great deal on a great TV!  Won at employee Christmas party!  Cannot wait to get it home and installed!

ProductInfo.Features:
Native Resolution: 1080p
Refresh Rate: 60Hz
2 HDMI inputs
Energy Star Qualified
ProductInfo.Name: 50" Sanyo LCD 1080p HDTV
